remarks.format: ## Remarks Name 属性可以看作是用户用来解释所引用的控件的文本字符串。The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to. 务必要具有中的所有控件的文本表示形式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，以便可以以编程方式引用的已本地化的方式的控件。It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.

Protected Overrides Function IsOffscreenCore () As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与此 关联的 是否显示在屏幕上。

span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示元素是否可见。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素可以在屏幕上，但仍不可见的例如，如果该元素将被遮盖其他元素。In some circumstances, an element can be on the screen but still not be visible, for example if the element is obscured by other elements. 在这种情况下，此方法将返回`false`。In this case the method would return `false`.
